body.name: Diono Radian 3R, 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Rear Facing & Forward Facing, 10 Years 1 Car Seat, Slim Fit 3 Across, Jet Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 35 mins
features: 10 Years One Car Seat - from Birth to Booster (5 - 120 lb) it's all you will need. Grows with your child, ultimate protection on every road trip. 4 modes in 1 seat!
Rear Facing for Longer - lovingly engineered to keep your child rear-facing up to 50 lb.
Fits 3-Across - our famous slim-fit design with zero compromises to safety, space, or comfort.
Mechanically engineered from reinforced automotive grade high-strength steel, our unique core shell shields and protects your child.
High-quality ComfortPlus Memory Foam, always included.
body.description: The Diono Radian 3R is the original slim-fit 3 across All-in-One convertible car seat, designed to protect from baby to booster seat (5 - 120 lb). Lovingly engineered with the famous Diono steel reinforced frame and now rear facing for even longer, expect 10 years of safety from just one car seat. Designed and engineered with complete rear facing protection, so you can keep them in a safe rear facing convertible car seat for longer up to 50 lb. Built with a mechanically engineered, reinforced steel frame, made from automotive grade high strength steel, the radian is always ready to shield and protect. And when your family grows, the slim-fit design will fit 3 across in most vehicles without compromising child safety or passenger comfort. Our SuperLATCH system (UAS Compatible) makes installation easy and super secure. As travel car seat experts, Diono have naturally built in super portable and convenient features to the Radian 3R with original fold for easy transport and storage and easy remove machine washable covers. The radian is also aircraft certified (FAA approved), so you can take safety with you wherever you go.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diono Engineering Safety starts within. Mechanically engineered, reinforced Steel Core. Includes Side Impact Protection, 5-Point Harness, Expandable Side Wings, SuperLATCH Connectors and Folds for Travel (FAA Approved).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Diono Radian 3R - A Game-Changer in Car Seat Comfort and Safety!
reviews.reviewText: The Diono Radian 3R 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat has proven to be an absolute game-changer for our family, and my son absolutely loves it!The versatility of this car seat is outstanding – from rear-facing to forward-facing, it's designed to accommodate different stages of a child's growth. The 10-year lifespan is a fantastic feature, providing peace of mind knowing that it will last through various developmental milestones.My son finds the seat incredibly comfortable, and the plush padding adds an extra layer of coziness. The reinforced steel frame gives a sense of security, and the installation process was surprisingly straightforward, thanks to the clear instructions provided.What sets the Diono Radian 3R apart is its slim design, making it a perfect fit even in compact cars without compromising safety. The adjustable headrest and harness system ensure a snug and secure fit as my son continues to grow.As a parent, I appreciate the ease of cleaning – the fabric is removable and machine washable, a lifesaver for those inevitable spills and messes.If you're in search of a convertible car seat that prioritizes both comfort and safety, the Diono Radian 3R is an excellent choice. It has made our car journeys much more enjoyable for my son, and as a parent, I couldn't be happier with this purchase! 🚗👶🌟 #DionoRadian3R #ConvertibleCarSeat #SafetyFirst

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, heavy, narrow, kid likes it
reviews.reviewText: I flew two trips with this and another seat. It is heavy for flights, but I managed, also fairly quick and easy to install in a plane seat. If flying with it again I would devise a way to lock it folded up and to carry it as a backpack. Usually it is installed in a full size truck and I like how it looks and is easy to get in and out of for my 4 almost 5 yr old. Full metal frame and latch design is not cheap so has me convinced it's a good safe choice. The last seat I'll need to buy I think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Sleek, Travel Friendly
reviews.reviewText: We own 4 of these car seats and have been extremely pleased with them! They keep our car looking sleek while providing adequate space in the backseat for our littles. Most car seats turn backseats into a claustrophobic’s nightmare, but not these! They also travel well (although their sturdy frame makes them a bit heavier). We throw one under our stroller and one strapped to a roller suitcase handle to transport them the short distance to airport baggage checks. Highly recommend and our toddler loves them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 across in smaller car
reviews.reviewText: There were 2 features I purchased this for. The narrow construction that allows for 3 carseats side by side. It took 2 of these and another narrow seat to fit forward facing in a Saturn ion. Second is the all in one. Won't need to buy another seat or booster.If used rear facing, these take up more room than other seats. They are tall, plus the angle make it difficult to fit in a small car with a tall person in the front seat. Would not work for an infant in my Ion.I also like that is very sturdy. There's lots of metal in the construction. Feels safer. The trade-off is that it's heavy. But that's not a concern unless moving it from car to car all the time.Have only used as a forward facing carseat so far. But I like all the options that it can be used for. There are less expensive seats, but having to buy a rear facing, then forward, then a booster ads up. May save money in the long run if starting with just this one all-in-one.On the other hand, the dedicated infant car seats that can detach are super handy for going into stores without unbuckling your baby. Something to consider.Overall, highly recommend this seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great car seat, toddler finds it comfortable and it takes up way less space then our old one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I randomly decided to downsize from a three-row vehicle to a two-row vehicle, so I needed to find car seats that would fit 3 across comfortably. These car seats definitely work for that.The thing I didn’t like about them is the company’s attempt to save money by not providing any instructions in the box (3 new boxes and absolutely no instructions). There are picture instructions on the side of the car seats, but like most things, these car seats are a little different than other car seats, so more detailed instructions would’ve been appreciated-particularly for rear-facing installation. If they want to save money, maybe they should provide a QR code with links to instructions and videos. They didn’t so I was left trying to find instructions for my exact model.The belts that give you lax for anchoring are also really annoying. Broke a few nails in the process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy car seat
reviews.reviewText: My son's car doesn't have a lot of room in the back seat of his Hyundai Elantra. This car seat works great and is very sturdy. Also very heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars feels solid very high quality product.
reviews.reviewText: We have four kids so we’ve gone thru our share of car seats and boosters, for budgetary reasons we always went with what was the most affordable usually that means plastic and low quality materials that wear out fast. This product is the complete opposite of low quality, it’s solid and strong but very comfortable and my daughter loves it, we needed something that she can grow with, for the past few months she kept moving around and being very wiggly in the car, while cleaning the car I noticed her car seat was wearing out and felt very uncomfortable, this new seat looks great and my daughter is sitting perfectly.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the one you want
reviews.reviewText: I need to have an adult sitting between the baby seats every now and then so I go for narrow car seats. I also have the Graco Tranzitions and a Clek Foonf. The Diono is heavy and strong kind of like the Clek, but narrow and minimalist like the Tranzitions. I would only use this seat rear-facing with the anti-rebound bar.I love the Graco Tranzitions, and my Clek, BUT the former is built out of plastic and the latter is very bulky. The Radian seems to have the best of both worlds, although it's not as light as the Tranzitions and not as sturdy as a Clek.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad y sencillo de instalar
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad, muy seguro y sencillo de instalar

reviews.reviewTitle: Thin, straps are easy to use, Comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: Did quite a bit of research and this car seat has been great. It fits comfortably in our sedan. The straps are smooth to adjust and don’t get twisted. My toddler seems comfortable in the seat and it seems very secure. Great value too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fairly easy install, instructions are hiding but there!
reviews.reviewText: Installed this rear-facing into my F-150 last night.The instruction manual IS there and it’s located inside the carseat at the back in the upper left side, there is a small symbol showing a book on the seat cover and if you unbutton the cover you can access it easily and pull it out (see my photos).I used the UAS strap to secure it but it definitely was not tight enough, seems to be common in my truck. But once I also attached the tether by following the instructions and looping it around the seat in fronts track, it appears to be tight enough now. I am going to double check it and if needed add the seatbelt as well. This is only the third car seat I’ve ever installed before so I’m not a complete expert.My daughter hasn’t used it yet but I will update my review once we use it for a while. I bought this particular car seat because it looks simple and it doesn’t block her view much and it feels very comfortable just from me pressing on it. And it is supposedly good for extended rear-facing. It is also a nice looking car seat from a reputable brand.
Very easy to install and remove from vehicle. Straps are easy to tighten and loosen. This is our second diono car seat. Slim design that helps allow 3 car seats go across. For added convenience
